ygData.msgSnippet: Silk evening tunic sold by a gypsy by Lions Mane (?) in South Qeynos for about 4pp add +5 cha; Order of Thunder (Drosco s amulet) another +5 cha. Sylly ...
ygData.messageBody:
Silk evening tunic sold by a gypsy by Lions Mane (?) in South Qeynos for
about 4pp add +5 cha; Order of Thunder (Drosco's amulet) another +5 cha.

Sylly

-----Original Message-----
From: JasonF [mailto:JasonF@...]
Sent: Thursday, November 11, 1999 1:11 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Charming Methods


From: "JasonF" <JasonF@...>

My CHA is around 105 with standard equipment on, another 15 if I use my
Crude Stein.

It has become apparent in reviewing the last couple of posts in this thread
that I'm either not coordinated enough to pull this off or I just need more
practice. I'll try and hit the Orc Cents again and give it another go, but
hell, if I can't even finish off two Orcs without losing half a bubble of
health, how am I going to fare with Froon and Choon?

Charming Griffs or HGs is simply laughable to me. I would die so damn
fast...
